mapper.select: SELECT c.CART_ID, c.MBR_ID, c.PROD_ID, p.PROD_NM, p.AMT, c.PROD_INDV_QTY, p.REP_IMG, p.DC_YN FROM `dobbyisfree`.`cart` c JOIN `dobbyisfree`.`prod` p ON c.PROD_ID = p.PROD_ID where MBR_ID = #{MBR_ID}
mapper.update: UPDATE `dobbyisfree`.`cart` SET PROD_INDV_QTY = #{PROD_INDV_QTY} WHERE MBR_ID = #{MBR_ID} AND PROD_ID = #{PROD_ID}
mapper.select: SELECT c.CART_ID, c.MBR_ID, p.PROD_ID, p.PROD_NM, p.AMT, c.PROD_INDV_QTY, p.REP_IMG, p.DC_YN FROM `dobbyisfree`.`cart` c JOIN `dobbyisfree`.`prod` p ON c.PROD_ID = p.PROD_ID WHERE c.CART_ID = #{CART_ID}
